title: Turkey opens embassy in Equatorial Guinea
content: Turkey has opened its first embassy in Equatorial Guineaâ€™s capital Malabo.

title: Taiwan police use Animal Crossing to return console
content: When they found the lost console, officers used the game to send a message to the owner's friends.

title: Heard: I loved Depp, but he could be a monster
content: The US actress "always held out hope" her former husband would get clean, the High Court hears.

title: Driver in court over Essex lorry deaths
content: Eamonn Harrison is accused of driving a trailer containing 39 Vietnamese migrants to a Belgian port.

title: Fugitive Chinese researcher 'hiding in consulate'
content: A scientist who allegedly lied about military ties is said to be inside China's San Francisco mission.

title: Italian police station shut over torture claims
content: Carabinieri military police are held on suspicion of crimes that have shocked the city of Piacenza.

title: Sharks 'extinct' in 20% of coral reefs
content: A new study has found the number of reef sharks around the world has fallen due to fishing.

title: Does Trump have the right to send in federal forces?
content: President Trump is sending federal agents to some US cities to tackle crime, despite local officials disputing his power to do that.
